Name: Vine Man Skip and Softlock
Description: Skip the vine guy by using a chicken and precise movement to clip onto a roof early. Softlock by approaching him from behind.

Name: Missing Cat Softlock
Description: Softlock from talking to the vine man after skipping him and feeding the cat.

Name: Rooftop Cat Softlock
Description: Softlock from talking to the vine man after obtaining the bottle of milk.

Name: [Theoretical] Hawk Skip
Description: Theoretical skip to avoid needing the hawk by picking up the cradle directly from the monkey's hands.

Name: Cat Warp
Description: Get the cats attention for the fish event from the wrong location.

Name: Flying Pumpkin Glitch
Description: Manipulate the pumpkin sprouts with boomerang.

Name: Smashing Pumpkins Temp Flag Storage
Description: Store the temp flag for the vine man yelling at Link. This flag does not appear to be shared, so this has no known use.

Name: Uli Cradle Turn-In Interrupt
Description: Throw the cradle while entering the frist turn-in trigger, which causes the cutscene to improperly play, and Uli to give her default dialog instead. No apparent use.

Name: Fishing Rod Item Obtain Dupe
Description: Obtain the Fishing Rod multiple times by performing a 1 frame jump to save/quit mid dialog. No apparent usage, as only one appears in inventory.

Name: Slingshot Recoil Glitch
Description: Warp to Ordon after doing Master Sword Early, and shoot Uli's husband with a slingshot. He will retaliate and knock you back no matter how far you are.

Name: Approach Uli as Wolf Link
Description: Precise jumps to get near Uli as Wolf Link without her freaking out. [HD only?]

Name: Midna First Jump Skip
Description: Perform a normal jump as Wolf Link instead of a Midna Jump. Technically not a glitch.

Name: Fish for Cat Softlock
Description: Use rod duping to catch the fish for the cat anywhere on the map. Doing this while interacting with various NPCs can result in softlocks.

Name: Cat Warp / Invisible Fish for Cat
Description: Catch a fish for the cat in the wrong area. Speeds up the cutscene. Can be used to save time, but RNG dependent.

Name: Infinite Death Softlock
Description: Attempt to enter the roof loading zone as Link via a well positioned transform, resulting in an infinite void out loop.

Name: Ordon Night Npc Respawn
Description: Look away while out of range, and the NPCs will instantly respawn

Name: Shield Obtained Dialogue Skip/Softlock
Description: After picking up the shield, do a frame perfect jump attack to escape the trigger that causes Midna's dialog to appear. However, this causes the Sword not to spawn, so this is not actually skippable.

Name: Vine Clip
Description: Perform vine clipping to get out of bounds and swim underneath the map.

Name: Slingshot Mini-game Reaction Skip
Description: While shooting the first target, speak to the kids while the slingshot pellet is midair. This dialog will cancel the reaction cutscene that normally plays. If executed perfectly, this should (unconfirmed) save fractions of a second.

Name: Slingshot Mini-game Partial Completion
Description: Complete and exit the slingshot mini-game at the same time. This will cause the targets to spawn outside of the mini-game, which normally only happens on completion.

Name: Sword Mini-game Escape
Description: Escape the sword mini-game by doing a jump slash to exit the mini-game early. No apparent usage.

Name: Wooden Sword Dialog Range Glitch
Description: Access cutscene dialog options outside of a cutscene. No apparent usage.

Name: Squirrel Text Displacement Softlock
Description: With certain text displacement bits set, the game will softlock on the squirrel dialog

Name: 21/20 Goats
Description: Make a goat angry and have it escape the pen after being counted. The goats will never end. Very precise.

Name: Goat Gate Skip (sorta)
Description: Use epona to leave Goats area. Does not work while Goats are active, because during the event, a massive invisible wall spawns.

Name: Gate Clip / Epona Gate Clip
Description: Position a rock or Epona to allow Link to clip through the fence.

Name: Tiny Cutscene Trigger
Description: Normally Link is teleported into this cutscene trigger, but via hacks we can get here and trigger it manually.

Name: Sword & Shield Skip
Description: Skip collecting the Ordon Sword / Shield.

Name: Faron Escape
Description: LJA to skip completing the Forest Temple / Faron Twilight.

Name: Faron Spirit Text Skip
Description: Close map instantly instead of waiting for all the dialogue.

Name: Faron Spirit Double Map
Description: The map and midna text displayed twice. (Note: If anyone has footage without lag, please let me know so I can use that instead)

Name: Vessel Midna Text Skip
Description: Between the cutscene of the Faron Vessel being completed and Midna's text, as human, backflip to avoid the text trigger.

Name: Lantern Dupe
Description: Obtain the Lantern multiple times by performing a 1 frame jump to save/quit mid dialog. No apparent usage, as only one appears in inventory.

Name: Coro Spirit Text Skip
Description: Turn off senses to skip Coro's spirit dialogue after killing bugs.

Name: Coro Text Displacement
Description: Obtain Text Displacement storage from Coro dialogue. This can be used to gain access to Goron Mines early.

Name: Nut Duping
Description: Duplicate nuts by dropping them in South Faron to unload the exterior and ride Epona out of bounds

Name: Ordona Spirit Water Epona OOB
Description: Use Epona to get out of bounds in the spring water

Name: Monkey Pushing
Description: Speed up the monkey mist escort sequence by pushing the monkey a little bit every cycle. Pushing him too much loses time, as this will cause the monkey to return to an "anchor" spot.

Name: Monkeyless Twilight Mist
Description: Traverse mist without the use of a monkey to guide you.

Name: Early Midna Jump
Description: Between Midna's text and the Midna jump becoming available entering the purple mist area from the tunnel - hold L and press A to start the Midna jump early.

Name: Skip Digging Bugs
Description: Voiding in the mist skips the need to dig up the bugs.

Name: Web Clip
Description: It seems that it is possible to clip through the webs if you get knocked into them at just the right time.

Name: Early Master Sword
Description: Obtain the Master Sword very early into the game.

Name: Bulbin Aggro Manipulation
Description: Hitting the first two Bulbins post-Twilight will cause the 3rd Bulbin in the next area to start running towards Link early.

Name: Talo Cutscene Storage
Description: Kill the last Bulbin, and then die or void out on the same (?) frame that Talo is freed. Upon respawning, the cutscene will play.

Name: Early Forest Temple (Epona Clip)
Description: Use rod duping + Ebona OOB to clip through the forest temple rocks early

Name: Early Forest Temple Escape
Description: Perform early forest temple with Rod Dupes + Epona. Before entering FT, break the cage, kill one enemy, and weaken the other. Prepare to enter FT, and finish off the last enemy with a slingshot. Do a frame perfect backflip into the loading zone 1 frame before the Talo cutscene plays. When leaving later, instead of voiding out, you will start the Talo cutscene.

Name: Faron Woods Shadow Beasts Void
Description: If you kill the shadow beasts in south Faron Woods on the first try, before she teaches you the Midna attack, and then you go intentionally fail to kill the shadow beasts in North Faron woods, you fall through the map and void out

Name: Void at Entrance
Description: Void out at the Forest Temple entrance. Can be used to perform BiT.

Name: Early Monkeys
Description: Set the boss flag to a valid value range after doing BiT, then load a Forest Temple file.

Name: Destroyed Wolf (Monkey Swing)
Description: Swing on the monkeys as Wolf Link. Requires Early Master Sword.

Name: Monkey Swing with Iron Boots
Description: Swing on the monkeys with iron boots by jump slashing into them

Name: Monkey Pushing
Description: Push monkeys while the Bokoblins are dying to save a very tiny amount of time.

Name: Diababa Soft-Lock
Description: Have a boss flag of value 1 and start the fight. Other EBFs skip intro cutscene, but this is already skippable.

Name: Diababa Wolf Link Kill Softlock
Description: Defeat Diababa as Wolf Link to softlock the cutscene afterwards. Requires Early Master Sword.

Name: [HD] Decal Texture Glitch
Description: A decal texture can project onto Link on the HD version of the game.

Name: Diababa Fused Shadow Collection Skip
Description: Die at the same time as Diababa, causing death to override collecting the fused shadow piece. Note: This is will prevent the story flag that allows Link to leave Faron.

Name: Ook Crash
Description: [Cross-post] See General tab for details.

Name: Skulltula Skip
Description: Not technically a glitch. Jump at the platform edge to avoid the hanging Skulltula.

Name: Invisible Monkeys
Description: TODO

Name: Early gale Boomerang (Bridge Clipping)
Description: Early Gale Boomerang by clipping into the edges of the rotating platforms.

Name: Ook Pillar Downclip
Description: Somehow roll into a pillar at just the right timing, speed, angle to clip into it after Ook throws a boomerang. This forces link to fall through the map and void.

Name: Grove 2 Skip
Description: Skip most of Sacred Grove 2, go directly to Temple of Time.

Name: Door Frame Grove Skip
Description: Another method for Grove Skip that uses a door frame ledge grab to clip out of bounds and LJA to the Skull Kid boss area.

Name: Early Skull Kid Trigger
Description: With arrows, it may be possible to hit the Skull Kid early in a few places, but this is not a sequence break because this does not warp you to him.

Name: Double Howl at Puzzle
Description: Spaming A after howling at the puzzle causes another howl, deferring the puzzle from starting. No known use.

Name: Master Sword Puzzle Skip
Description: Perform Gale LJAs to get out of bounds, skipping the puzzle right before Master Sword. Not done in Any% since we don't have gale at this point.

Name: Sacred Grove OOB / Loading Zone Bypass
Description: Use jumpstrike to get OOB in the second Grove map.

Name: Wall Clip
Description: Long Jump Attack to get onto a ledge, where Link can fall through the level geometry and land outside the map.

Name: Rocks in Sacred Grove Puzzle
Description: There are rocks in a back room that can be rolled into the puzzle area, and these seem to persist after the puzzle is started. Can potentially be used to void out wolf link, but doing so would provide no benefit (puzzle just restarts)

Name: First Room Midna Text Skip via Cutscene Drop
Description: Trigger a cutscene drop via bottle cutscene to cause the boomerang to drop a pot on the switch early.

Name: Ooccoo Cutscene Skip
Description: Can Gale Boomerang Long Jump Attack over the cutscene trigger

Name: Gate Puzzle Skips (Jump Attack Method)
Description: Jump attack after clawshotting above the gate to skip the puzzle that normally opens them

Name: Gate 2 Puzzle Skip (Bomb Boost Method)
Description: Gale Long Jump Attack + Bomb Boost to skip door.

Name: Early Poe
Description: Use Helm Splitter on a boomerang stunned Lizalfos to gain enough speed to bypass the gate leading to the poe

Name: 2nd Small Statue Skip
Description: Side hop onto the rising platform after placing the 1st statue to skip the need to place the 2nd one.

Name: Heart Piece Chest without Control Rod
Description: Throw the statues at precise angles to place them on the switches without the need for using the control rod

Name: Darknut / Statue Cutscene Overlap
Description: Overlap the Darknut and Statue cutscenes by guiding the statue onto the switch on the same frame the Darknut dies. Note: The door open cutscene can also be overlapped with these two.

Name: Chest Cutscene "Skip"
Description: Die after lighting both torches to reveal the chest. On respawn, the torches will remain unlit, but the chest will be spawned. Does not save time.

Name: Big Key without Spinner or Hidden Skills
Description: Use a bomb boosted LJA to access the big key early

Name: Big Key with Jump Strike + Moon Boots
Description: Jump Strike + Moon Boots onto railing, then clawshot above boss key

Name: Electric Gate Skip via LJA
Description: Long Jump Attack with Gale Boomerang to skip needing to place statue on switch

Name: Armogoma Teleport
Description: ? No idea

Name: Armogoma Walk on Invisible Lower Ceiling
Lizard Clipping
Description: Clip lizard enemy through the floor by causing the giant bell to crush them.

Name: First room Door Skip
Description: Use a controlled statue to push Link through the door.

Name: [Cross-Post] ToT Lizalfos (?) Bomb Arrow Crash
Description: Shooting a Lizalfos from where the small key chest is with a bomb arrow can cause a crash since they are not fully loaded (?) or something..

Name: 3rd staircase armos skip with BSMB BB
Description: Use backstrike moon boots to skip the 3rd staircase armos
